entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 8}, reach 5 ft. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d8 + 5}) Piercing damage plus 10 ({@damage 3d6}) Necrotic damage. The target's {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB|Hit Point} maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the Necrotic damage taken, and the gobblegeist regains {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB} equal to that amount.

action.name: Talons
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 8}, reach 5 ft. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d8 + 5}) Piercing damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the {@condition Grappled|XPHB} condition (escape {@dc 15}) from both talons, and it has the {@condition Restrained|XPHB} condition until the grapple ends.

action.name: Eye Beam
entries: {@actSave dex} {@dc 14}, each creature in a 120-foot-long, 5-foot-wide line. {@actSaveFail} 6 ({@damage 1d12}) Psychic damage, and the target has the {@condition Stunned|XPHB} condition until the start of the gobblegeist's next turn.

trait.name: Endless Footwork
entries: When the herald's {@variantrule Speed|XPHB} is 0, attack rolls made against it have {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB}, and if its {@variantrule Speed|XPHB} is 0 at the start of its turn, it takes 20 Necrotic damage. Perfect Grace. The herald doesn't provoke an Opportunity Attack when it leaves an enemy's reach.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The herald makes three Banner Pole attacks. It can replace one attack with a use of Lethal Jape. Banner Pole. Melee {@variantrule Attack Roll|XPHB}: {@hit 10} (with {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB} if the target's {@variantrule Speed|XPHB} is 0), reach 10 ft. {@h}11 ({@damage 1d10 + 6}) Slashing damage plus 13 ({@damage 3d8}) Thunder damage, and if the target is a Large or smaller creature, the herald can move it to any other unoccupied space within the Banner Pole's reach.

action.name: Lethal Jape
entries: {@actSave wis} {@dc 15}, a creature the herald can see within 60 feet. {@actSaveFail} 24 ({@damage 7d6}) Psychic damage, and the target's {@variantrule Speed|XPHB} is 0 until the end of its next turn. {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage only.

reaction.name: Wave the Banner
entries: {@actTrigger} An ally of the herald's within 60 feet misses with an attack roll or fails a saving throw. {@actResponse} The ally can reroll the {@dice d20} and must use the new roll.

monster.name: Hospital Horror
languages: understands Common and Deep Speech but can't speak

trait.name: Aversion to Needles
entries: If the horror takes Piercing damage, it has {@variantrule Disadvantage|XPHB} on attack rolls until the end of its next turn.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The horror has {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB} on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the horror's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally doesn't have the {@condition Incapacitated|XPHB} condition.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The horror makes two Graft Blade attacks.

action.name: Graft Blade
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 6}, reach 5 ft. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) Slashing damage.

bonus.name: Stim Burst
entries: The horror takes the Dash action and can jump up to 30 feet by spending 10 feet of movement.

monster.name: House of Horror
languages: understands Common plus one other language but can't speak

trait.name: Construction
entries: Creatures can enter the house's space and navigate it as a normal building. The house makes attacks from any surface or object that isn't being worn or carried within its space. It doesn't have {@variantrule Disadvantage|XPHB} on ranged attack rolls due to an enemy being within 5 feet of it.

If a creature deals 30 or more damage in a single turn to a 5-foot section of the house's structure, the house must succeed on a {@dc 18} Constitution saving throw or a 5-foot opening appears in that space until the start of the creature's next turn.

trait.name: Exorcism Susceptibility
entries: If the house is targeted by a {@spell Dispel Evil and Good|XPHB} spell, it has the {@condition Stunned|XPHB} condition. At the end of each of its turns, it can make a {@dc 15} Charisma saving throw, ending the condition on itself on a success. After 1 minute, it succeeds automatically. As a Magic action, a creature inside the house that throws a flask of Holy Water against the house and succeeds on a {@dc 20} Charisma check affects the house as above.

trait.name: Soul Trap
entries: A Humanoid that dies within the house has its soul trapped there until the house dies. The creature can't be returned to life by any means short of a {@spell True Resurrection|XPHB} or {@spell Wish|XPHB} spell.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The house makes three attacks, using Structure Slam or {@variantrule Object|XPHB} Fling in any combination, and it uses Agonized Souls.

action.name: Structure Slam
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 11}, reach 5 ft. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d8 + 6}) Bludgeoning damage plus 9 ({@damage 2d8}) Force damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the {@condition Grappled|XPHB} condition (escape {@dc 16}). The house can grapple up to two creatures at a time, using animated furniture, objects, or fixtures such as stair railings.

action.name: Object Fling
entries: {@atkr r} {@hit 11}, range 20/60 ft. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d4 + 6}) Bludgeoning or Piercing damage (house's choice). If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the {@condition Prone|XPHB} condition.

action.name: Agonized Souls
entries: The house's stolen souls torment a victim. {@actSave wis} {@dc 16}, a creature within 10 feet of the house. {@actSaveFail} 36 ({@damage 8d8}) Necrotic damage. {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage.

bonus.name: Alter Structure
entries: The house can reshape itself to change the location of walls, doors, floors, and other features of its construction. When one of these features appears or disappears, a creature within 5 feet of a changing feature can make a {@dc 18} Dexterity saving throw. On a successful save, the creature chooses which side of a feature it ends up on, or it moves to the nearest unoccupied space to avoid falling.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The hypnovulfen has {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB} on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The hypnovulfen makes one Bite attack and one Claw attack, and it can use Swallow.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 12}, reach 5 ft. {@h}18 ({@damage 2d10 + 7}) Piercing damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) Psychic damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it has the {@condition Grappled|XPHB} condition (escape {@dc 17}), and it has the {@condition Restrained|XPHB} condition until the grapple ends.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 12}, reach 5 ft. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d6 + 7}) Piercing damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) Psychic damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the {@condition Prone|XPHB} condition.

action.name: Swallow
entries: {@actSave str} {@dc 20}, one Medium or smaller creature {@condition Grappled|XPHB} by the hypnovulfen (the hypnovulfen can have only one creature swallowed at a time). {@actSaveFail} The hypnovulfen swallows the target, which is no longer {@condition Grappled|XPHB}. While swallowed, a creature has the {@condition Blinded|XPHB} and {@condition Restrained|XPHB} conditions, has {@variantrule Cover|XPHB|Total Cover} against attacks and other effects outside the hypnovulfen, and takes 21 ({@damage 6d6}) Psychic damage at the start of each of the hypnovulfen's turns. If the creature dies from this damage, the hypnovulfen absorbs its memories and regains 25 {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB}.

If the hypnovulfen takes 30 damage or more on a single turn from the swallowed creature, the hypnovulfen must succeed on a {@dc 16} Constitution saving throw at the end of that turn or regurgitate the creature, which falls in a space within 10 feet of the hypnovulfen and has the {@condition Prone|XPHB} condition. If the hypnovulfen dies, a swallowed creature is no longer {@condition Restrained|XPHB} and can escape from the corpse by using 15 feet of movement, exiting {@condition Prone|XPHB}.

bonus.name: Hypnotic Gaze {@recharge 5}
entries: {@actSave wis} {@dc 19}, each creature in a 30-foot {@variantrule Cone [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Cone}. A creature holding a keepsake from a loved one succeeds automatically. {@actSaveFail} The creature has the {@condition Charmed|XPHB} condition until it takes damage. While {@condition charmed}, it has the {@condition Incapacitated|XPHB} condition and must move as close to the hypnovulfen as possible by the safest route. The creature repeats the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. After 1 minute, it succeeds automatically.

trait.name: Alien Mind
entries: If a creature tries to read the intruder's mind or deals Psychic damage to it, that creature must succeed on a {@dc 16} Intelligence saving throw or have the {@condition Stunned|XPHB} condition for 1 minute. It repeats the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

trait.name: Gliding Levitation
entries: The invader hovers 6 inches above the ground and leaves no tracks. It ignores {@variantrule Difficult Terrain|XPHB} caused by conditions on the ground, can move over liquids, and takes no damage from falling.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The invader has {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB} on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Weak Constitution
entries: The invader has {@variantrule Disadvantage|XPHB} on saving throws to avoid or end the {@condition Poisoned|XPHB} condition. If the invader is {@condition Poisoned|XPHB} at the start of its turn, it takes 20 Necrotic damage.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The invader makes three Disrupting Touch attacks and uses Unnerving Glare if available.

action.name: Disrupting Touch
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 8}, reach 5 ft. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d10 + 4}) Force damage. A creature killed or an object destroyed by this damage is reduced to a fine gray dust.
Magic items, and any equipment worn or carried by a disintegrated creature, don't disintegrate.

action.name: Unnerving Glare {@recharge 5}
entries: {@actSave wis} {@dc 16}, one creature the invader can see within 60 feet. {@actSaveFail} The target has the {@condition Incapacitated|XPHB} condition until the start of the invader's next turn.

reaction.name: Otherworldly Slip
entries: {@actTrigger} The invader takes damage. {@actResponse} The invader teleports to an unoccupied space it can see within 60 feet and can cause the following—{@actSave int} {@dc 16}, each creature within a 30-foot {@variantrule Emanation [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Emanation} originating from the space where the invader vanished or appeared (invader's choice). {@actSaveFail} 16 ({@damage 3d10}) Psychic damage, and the target's {@variantrule Speed|XPHB} is halved until the end of its next turn. {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage only.

trait.name: Incorporeal Movement
entries: The kackle can move through other creatures and objects as if they were {@variantrule Difficult Terrain|XPHB}. It takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) Force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

trait.name: Lantern Vulnerability
entries: The kackle's lantern has AC 15 and {@variantrule Immunity|XPHB} to Poison and Psychic damage. Any damage the lantern takes deals half that amount of Force damage to the kackle.

action.name: Lantern Flame
entries: {@atkr m,r} {@hit 7}, reach 5 ft. or range 90 ft. {@h}Varies by lantern color (kackle's choice):

action.name: Blue
entries: 7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) Cold damage, and the target has the {@condition Restrained|XPHB} condition until the end of its next turn.

action.name: Green
entries: 20 ({@damage 3d10 + 4}) Necrotic damage, and the target's {@variantrule Speed|XPHB} is 0 until the end of its next turn.

action.name: Purple
entries: 10 ({@damage 1d12 + 4}) Psychic damage, and the target has the {@condition Frightened|XPHB} condition until the end of its next turn.

action.name: Red
entries: 15 ({@damage 2d10 + 4}) Fire damage, and the target starts {@hazard burning|XPHB}, taking 5 ({@damage 1d10}) Fire damage instead of the regular burning damage.

bonus.name: Flickering Teleport
entries: The kackle teleports up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space it can see. The kackle can then change its lantern color, and it can create the following—{@actSave dex} {@dc 15}, each creature in a 5-foot {@variantrule Emanation [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Emanation} originating from the kackle's destination space. {@actSaveFail} 13 ({@damage 3d8}) damage of the same type as the current Lantern Flame color. {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The keeper casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 16}, {@hit 8} to hit with spell attacks):

trait.name: Blight Dependent
entries: If the keeper is targeted by an effect that ends the {@condition Poisoned|XPHB} condition, it takes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) Force damage and has {@variantrule Disadvantage|XPHB} on {@variantrule D20 Test|XPHB|D20 Tests} until the end of its next turn.

trait.name: Fungal Step
entries: The keeper ignores {@variantrule Difficult Terrain|XPHB} caused by plants or fungi.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The keeper makes two attacks, using Blight Staff or Spore Spray in any combination, and it uses Rotting {@variantrule Ritual|XPHB}.

action.name: Blight Staff
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 8}, reach 5 ft. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d8 + 5}) Bludgeoning damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) Necrotic damage.

action.name: Spore Spray
entries: {@atkr r} {@hit 8}, range 60 ft. {@h}9 ({@damage 2d8}) Poison damage. If the target is a creature, it has the {@condition Poisoned|XPHB} condition until the end of the keeper's next turn.

action.name: Rotting Ritual
entries: The keeper magically creates one of the following effects of its choice. It can't use the same effect twice in a row.

action.name: Frenzying Spores
entries: {@actSave wis} {@dc 16}, a creature the keeper can see within 30 feet. {@actSaveFail} 10 ({@damage 3d6}) Psychic damage, and the target must immediately take a {@variantrule Reaction|XPHB} to make a melee or ranged attack against a creature of the keeper's choice that is within reach or range of the attack. {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage only.

action.name: Blight Spawn
entries: The keeper magically summons a Rotweaver (lacks a Hunting Horn) in an unoccupied space within 30 feet of itself. The rotweaver takes its turn immediately after the keeper on the same {@variantrule Initiative|XPHB} count, and it obeys the keeper. The rotweaver vanishes after 1 minute, or when it or the keeper dies.

action.name: Devouring Fungus
entries: Life-sapping fungus sprouts from the ground in a 60-foot radius centered on the keeper.

The area is {@variantrule Difficult Terrain|XPHB}, and a creature has the {@condition Poisoned|XPHB} condition while within the area. The fungus remains for 1 minute, until the keeper uses this effect again, or until it dies.

spellcasting.name: Invisibility
headerEntries: The ketgrinn casts {@spell Invisibility|XPHB} on itself, requiring no spell components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The ketgrinn has {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB} on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Mimicry
entries: The ketgrinn can mimic any voice it has heard, or a voice it has stolen (see Consume Voice below). A creature that hears the voice can tell it's an imitation with a successful {@dc 14} Wisdom ({@skill Insight|XPHB}) check. The DC increases to 19 for a voice the ketgrinn has stolen.

trait.name: Riddle Bound
entries: As an {@action Influence|XPHB} action, a creature that poses a riddle to the ketgrinn and succeeds on a {@dc 16} Charisma ({@skill Deception|XPHB}) check gives the ketgrinn the {@condition Incapacitated|XPHB} condition until the start of the creature's next turn. Each riddle posed increases the DC for future riddles by 1 for 24 hours.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The ketgrinn makes two Claw attacks. It can replace one attack with a use of Consume Voice.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 6}, reach 5 ft. {@h}9 ({@damage 2d4 + 4}) Slashing damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) Psychic damage, and if the target is a creature, it has {@variantrule Disadvantage|XPHB} on the next saving throw the ketgrinn forces it to make before the end of the ketgrinn's next turn.

action.name: Consume Voice
entries: {@actSave cha} {@dc 14}, one creature within 5 feet. {@actSaveFail} 18 ({@damage 4d8}) Psychic damage, and the ketgrinn steals the target's voice. The target can't speak or make any verbal sound while its voice is stolen.

The target repeats the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If it fails three of these saving throws, the loss is permanent, and its voice only returns when the ketgrinn dies. {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage only.

bonus.name: Teleport
entries: The ketgrinn teleports up to 40 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

trait.name: Depicted Demise
entries: The lake dredger takes 20 Force damage at the start of its turn if it can see a creature holding a created depiction (such as a drawing, painting, or carving) of the lake dredger.

trait.name: Silt Stealth
entries: The lake dredger has {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB} on Dexterity ({@skill Stealth|XPHB}) checks made when in an area with aquatic plants or seaweed.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The lake dredger makes one Bite attack and one Tail attack.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 10}, reach 10 ft. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d8 + 6}) Piercing damage plus 4 ({@damage 1d8}) Necrotic damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the {@condition Grappled|XPHB} condition (escape {@dc 16}), and it has the {@condition Restrained|XPHB} condition until the grapple ends.

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 10}, reach 15 ft. {@h}24 ({@damage 4d8 + 6}) Bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Huge or smaller creature, it has the {@condition Prone|XPHB} condition.

bonus.name: Swallow
entries: {@actSave dex} {@dc 18}, one Large or smaller creature {@condition Grappled|XPHB} by the lake dredger (the lake dredger can only have one creature swallowed at a time). {@actSaveFail} The lake dredger swallows the target, which is no longer {@condition Grappled|XPHB}. While swallowed, the creature has the {@condition Restrained|XPHB} condition, has {@variantrule Cover|XPHB|Three-Quarters Cover} against attacks and other effects outside the lake dredger, and takes 21 ({@damage 6d6}) Necrotic damage at the start of each of the lake dredger's turns.

As an action, the swallowed creature can escape through the lake dredger's ribcage. The creature takes 11 ({@damage 2d10}) Piercing damage and emerges in a space within 5 feet of the lake dredger. If the lake dredger dies, a swallowed creature is no longer {@condition Restrained|XPHB} and can escape from the corpse by using 15 feet of movement, exiting {@condition Prone|XPHB}.

trait.name: Nightmarish Contortion
entries: The lurker can fit into a space as small as a 1-foot {@variantrule Cube [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Cube} and can pass through a space as narrow as 1 inch without expending extra movement to do so.

trait.name: Spider Climb
entries: The lurker can climb difficult surfaces, including along ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

trait.name: Ward of Innocence
entries: The lurker can't attack or willingly move to a space within 10 feet of a creature holding a stuffed animal once owned by a child.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The lurker makes two Claw attacks.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 6}, reach 10 ft. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d10 + 4}) Slashing damage, and if the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it has the {@condition Grappled|XPHB} condition (escape {@dc 14}) from one of two claws. Until the grapple ends, the target has the {@condition Restrained|XPHB} condition.

bonus.name: Dark Teleport
entries: While the lurker isn't in {@variantrule Bright Light|XPHB}, it teleports up to 120 feet to an unoccupied space it can see. If the destination space isn't in {@variantrule Bright Light|XPHB}, the lurker doesn't need to see it. A creature the lurker is grappling must succeed on a {@dc 13} Charisma saving throw or teleport with the lurker to an unoccupied space closest to the lurker's destination.

trait.name: Undoing Gift (1/Day)
entries: The maidenwood must accept and eat an apple offered to it or to its lure. The maidenwood then takes 55 ({@damage 10d10}) Poison damage and has the {@condition Poisoned|XPHB} condition for 1 minute.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The maidenwood makes two Tendril attacks. It can replace one attack with a Chew attack.

action.name: Tendril
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 10}, reach 10 ft. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d8 + 6}) Bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the {@condition Grappled|XPHB} condition (escape {@dc 16}) from one of two tendrils. Until the grapple ends, it has the {@condition Restrained|XPHB} condition.

action.name: Chew
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 10}, reach 5 ft. {@h}11 ({@damage 1d10 + 6}) Piercing damage. If the target has the {@condition Restrained|XPHB} condition, it takes an extra 18 ({@damage 4d8}) Piercing damage.

bonus.name: Lure
entries: The maidenwood shapes its lure into a Small or Medium Humanoid, or it retracts the lure. The maidenwood can speak through the lure and move it anywhere within reach of its tendrils, and it causes the following effect—{@actSave int} {@dc 15}, one creature within 30 feet of the lure. {@actSaveFail} The target has the {@condition Charmed|XPHB} condition until the start of the maidenwood's next turn. The {@condition Charmed|XPHB} target must approach the lure as closely as it can. The maidenwood has {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB} on attack rolls against the {@condition Charmed|XPHB} target. If the target takes damage, the {@condition Charmed|XPHB} condition ends at the end of the current turn.

reaction.name: Absorb Magic
entries: {@actTrigger} The maidenwood succeeds on a saving throw against a spell or other magical effect, or a spell attack roll misses it. {@actResponse} The maidenwood gains 10 {@variantrule Temporary Hit Points|XPHB}.

trait.name: Anchoring Mask
entries: The nurse has a porcelain mask (AC 15; HP 15; {@variantrule Immunity|XPHB} to Poison and Psychic damage). If the nurse starts its turn and isn't wearing its mask, it must move as far as possible to retrieve its mask if possible, or to reach the closest creature it can see or hear, and it must attack that creature. If it can't see or hear any other creatures, it either stands still and does nothing, or it destroys any objects in its vicinity (50 percent chance of either).

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The nurse makes two Stab attacks. If it hits a creature with a Stab attack, it can use Inject if available.

action.name: Stab
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 5}, reach 5 ft. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) Piercing damage plus 3 ({@damage 1d6}) Poison damage.

action.name: Inject {@recharge 5}
entries: {@actSave con} {@dc 13}, a creature the nurse hit with a Stab attack this turn. {@actSaveFail} 10 ({@damage 3d6}) Psychic damage, and the target has the {@condition Poisoned|XPHB} condition for 1 hour. Failure by 5 or More: The {@condition Poisoned|XPHB} target also has the {@condition Unconscious|XPHB} condition until it takes damage or a creature within 5 feet of it takes an action to shake it awake. {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage only.

action.name: Mutation
entries: The nurse has one of the following mutation action options:

items.name: Cerebral Graft
entries: Part of a psionic creature's brain is grafted to the nurse's own. {@actSave int} {@dc 13}, one creature within 30 feet. {@actSaveFail} 11 ({@damage 2d10}) Psychic damage, and the target has the {@condition Stunned|XPHB} condition until the end of its next turn. {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage only.

items.name: Tentacle Lash
entries: A tentacle writhes beneath the nurse's skin or clothes. {@actSave dex} {@dc 13}, each creature in a 30-foot {@variantrule Cone [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Cone}. {@actSaveFail} 10 ({@damage 3d6}) Bludgeoning damage, and the target has the {@condition Prone|XPHB} condition. {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage only.

bonus.name: Catalyst (Recharge after Short or Long Rest)
entries: The nurse injects itself with a stimulant. Until the start of the nurse's next turn, its {@variantrule Speed|XPHB} is doubled, it can make one extra Stab attack when it takes the Multiattack action, and it gains a +2 bonus to AC.

trait.name: Entrapping Saliva
entries: The necrolisk ignores {@variantrule Immunity|XPHB} to the Grappled and {@condition Restrained|XPHB} conditions of a creature with the Incorporeal Movement trait. Creatures swallowed by the necrolisk can't pass through it using Incorporeal Movement or through the Ethereal Plane, and creatures can't teleport out of its stomach.

trait.name: Herb Allergy
entries: If the necrolisk eats a specific concoction of herbs worth 25 GP (such as if a swallowed creature pours them into its stomach as a Utilize action), at the end of the turn, the necrolisk regurgitates anything in its stomach as if it failed the saving throw described in its Swallow {@variantrule Bonus Action|XPHB}.

trait.name: Spider Climb
entries: The necrolisk can climb difficult surfaces, including along ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

trait.name: Tunneler
entries: The necrolisk can burrow through solid rock at half its {@variantrule Burrow Speed|XPHB} and leaves a 10-foot-diameter tunnel in its wake.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The necrolisk makes one Bite attack and one Claws attack.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 10}, reach 15 ft. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d8 + 6}) Piercing damage plus 3 ({@damage 1d6}) Force damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the Grappled condition (escape {@dc 16}). Until the grapple ends, it has the {@condition Restrained|XPHB} condition.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 10}, reach 10 ft. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d6 + 6}) Slashing damage plus 4 ({@damage 1d8}) Force damage.

action.name: Ephemeral Spit {@recharge 5}
entries: {@actSave dex} {@dc 16}, each creature in a 60-foot-long, 5-foot-wide {@variantrule Line [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Line}. {@actSaveFail} 42 ({@damage 12d6}) Force damage, and the target has the {@condition Restrained|XPHB} condition until the end of its next turn. {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage only.

bonus.name: Swallow
entries: {@actSave dex} {@dc 18}, one Large or smaller creature Grappled by the necrolisk (the necrolisk can only have one creature swallowed at a time). {@actSaveFail} The necrolisk swallows the target, which is no longer

bonus.name: Grappled
entries: While swallowed, the creature has the {@condition Blinded|XPHB} and {@condition Restrained|XPHB} conditions, has {@variantrule Cover|XPHB|Total Cover} against attacks and other effects outside the necrolisk, and takes 21 ({@damage 6d6}) Force damage at the start of each of the necrolisk's turns.

If the necrolisk takes 30 damage or more on a single turn from the swallowed creature, the necrolisk must succeed on a {@dc 14} Constitution saving throw at the end of that turn or regurgitate the creature, which falls in a space within 10 feet of the necrolisk and has the {@condition Prone|XPHB} condition. If the necrolisk dies, a swallowed creature is no longer {@condition Restrained|XPHB} and can escape from the corpse by using 15 feet of movement, exiting {@condition Prone|XPHB}.

vulnerable.special: Damage from weapons wiped with salt

trait.name: Blood Stalker
entries: The night creature has {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB} on Wisdom checks made to find or track a creature that is missing any {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB}.

trait.name: Salt Susceptibility
entries: The night creature has {@variantrule Vulnerability|XPHB} to damage from weapons wiped with salt. A creature can take a {@variantrule Bonus Action|XPHB} to wipe salt onto a weapon, which remains coated for 1 minute, or until it hits a creature.

trait.name: Spider Climb
entries: The night creature can climb difficult surfaces, including along ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

trait.name: Sunlight Hypersensitivity
entries: The night creature takes 20 Radiant damage if it starts its turn in sunlight. While in sunlight, it has {@variantrule Disadvantage|XPHB} on attack rolls and ability checks.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The night creature makes one Claw attack and uses Bite.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 6}, reach 5 ft. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) Slashing damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it has the {@condition Grappled|XPHB} condition (escape {@dc 14}) from one of two claws.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@actSave con} {@dc 14}, one creature within 5 feet that is willing or that has the {@condition Grappled|XPHB}, {@condition Incapacitated|XPHB}, or {@condition Restrained|XPHB} condition. {@actSaveFail} 6 ({@damage 1d4 + 4}) Piercing damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) Necrotic damage. The target's {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB|Hit Point} maximum decreases by an amount equal to the Necrotic damage taken, and the night creature regains {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB} equal to that amount.

bonus.name: Shape-Shift
entries: If the night creature isn't in sunlight, it shape-shifts into a Medium Humanoid or returns to its true form. Its game statistics, other than its size, are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting (Requires Animal Mask)
headerEntries: The chosen casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components other than its Animal Mask and using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 15}, {@hit 7} to hit with spell attacks):

trait.name: Animal Mask
entries: The chosen wears the mask of an animal, imbuing it with the strength of the old gods. When a creature is grappling the chosen, the creature can remove the mask as an action, or as an attack during the Attack action, with a successful {@dc 12} Strength ({@skill Athletics|XPHB}) check. Without its mask, the chosen can't cast spells, its {@status Concentration|XPHB} on any existing spells ends, and the save DC of Song of the Old Ways is reduced by 4.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The chosen makes three {@variantrule Ritual|XPHB} Dagger attacks.

action.name: Ritual Dagger
entries: {@atkr m,r} {@hit 7}, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d4 + 4}) Piercing damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) Radiant or Necrotic damage (the chosen's choice).

action.name: Songs of the Old Ways {@recharge 5}
entries: The chosen sings one of the following songs:

action.name: Blessing of the Harvest
entries: Each creature of the chosen's choice in a 30-foot {@variantrule Emanation [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Emanation} originating from the chosen regains 14 ({@dice 4d4 + 4}) {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB}.

action.name: Song of Sacrifice
entries: {@actSave con} {@dc 14}, one creature within 30 feet. {@actSaveFail} 40 ({@damage 9d8}) Necrotic damage, and the target has the {@condition Paralyzed|XPHB} condition until the end of the chosen's next turn. {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage only.

action.name: Wicker Chant
entries: {@actSave dex} {@dc 14}, each creature of the chosen's choice in a 20-foot {@variantrule Emanation [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Emanation} originating from the chosen. {@actSaveFail} 31 ({@damage 9d6}) Fire damage. {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage.

bonus.name: Jump (Requires Animal Mask)
entries: The chosen casts {@spell Jump|XPHB}, using the same spell components and spellcasting ability as Spellcasting.

trait.name: Breathless Warding
entries: A creature holding its breath has the {@condition Invisible|XPHB} condition to the hearse. If the creature takes damage while holding its breath, it must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw or let out its breath and become visible to the hearse until the start of the creature's next turn, when it can hold its breath again.

trait.name: Incorporeal Movement
entries: The hearse can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. It takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) Force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The hearse makes two Ghostly Coachman attacks. It can replace one of the attacks with a use of Trample, if available.
BestIAry

action.name: Ghostly Coachman
entries: {@atkr m,r} {@hit 8}, reach 10 ft. or range 60 ft. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) Cold damage. If the target is a creature, it can't regain {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB} until the start of the hearse's next turn.

action.name: Trample {@recharge 5}
entries: The hearse moves in a straight line up to its {@variantrule Speed|XPHB}. {@actSave dex} {@dc 16}, each creature whose space the hearse enters during this action. {@actSaveFail} 10 ({@damage 3d6}) Cold damage. If the target is Medium or smaller, it has the {@condition Grappled|XPHB} condition (escape {@dc 14}), and it has the {@condition Restrained|XPHB} condition until the grapple ends. {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage only.

action.name: Tolling Bell (1/Day)
entries: {@actSave wis} {@dc 16}, each creature of the hearse's choice that it can see in a 30-foot {@variantrule Emanation [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Emanation} originating from the hearse. {@actSaveFail} 44 ({@damage 8d10}) Psychic damage, and the creature's {@variantrule Speed|XPHB} is halved until the start of the hearse's next turn. {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage only.

bonus.name: Entomb
entries: {@actSave str} {@dc 16}, one creature {@condition Grappled|XPHB} by the hearse (it can have up to three creatures entombed at a time). {@actSaveFail} The target is entombed in a coffin in the hearse, and the {@condition Grappled|XPHB} condition ends.

An entombed target has the {@condition Blinded|XPHB} and {@condition Restrained|XPHB} conditions, has {@variantrule Cover|XPHB|Total Cover} against attacks and other effects outside the hearse, and at the start of each of the hearse's turns it takes 21 ({@damage 6d6}) Necrotic damage and gains 1 {@condition Exhaustion|XPHB} level.

If the hearse takes 20 damage or more on a single turn from a creature inside a coffin, the hearse must succeed on a {@dc 12} Constitution saving throw at the end of that turn or release all entombed creatures, each of which falls in a space within 5 feet of the hearse and has the {@condition Prone|XPHB} condition. If the hearse dies, any entombed creature falls to the ground with the {@condition Prone|XPHB} condition in the hearse's former space.

spellcasting.name: Coven Magic
headerEntries: While within 30 feet of at least two hag allies, the hag can cast one of the following spells, requiring no Material components, using the spell's normal casting time, and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability: {@spell Augury|XPHB}, {@spell Find Familiar|XPHB}, {@spell Identify|XPHB}, {@spell Locate Object|XPHB}, {@spell Lucky Charm|CrookedMoon24} (lasts until the hag casts it again, or chooses to end it with no action required), or {@spell Unseen Servant|XPHB}. The hag must finish a {@variantrule Long Rest|XPHB} before using this trait to cast that spell again.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The hag casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 19}):

trait.name: Disarming Vanity
entries: As an {@action Influence|XPHB} action, a creature that flatters the hag forces it to succeed on a {@dc 17} Charisma saving throw or have the {@condition Incapacitated|XPHB} condition until the end of the hag's next turn.

trait.name: Harrying Wings
entries: When the hag rolls {@variantrule Initiative|XPHB}, it is surrounded by fey spirits in the form of angry pigeons.

The hag's enemies within a 10-foot {@variantrule Emanation [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Emanation} originating from it have {@variantrule Disadvantage|XPHB} on ability checks and attack rolls. This trait doesn't function if the hag has the {@condition Incapacitated|XPHB} condition.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The hag makes three Claw attacks. It can replace one attack with a use of Spellcasting (at will spells only).

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 10}, reach 5 ft. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) Slashing damage plus 10 ({@damage 3d6}) Psychic damage.

action.name: Agonizing Cackle (1/Day)
entries: {@actSave wis} {@dc 19}, each creature in a 60-foot {@variantrule Cone [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Cone}. {@actSaveFail} A target takes 45 ({@damage 10d8}) Psychic damage and has the {@condition Incapacitated|XPHB} condition until the start of the hag's next turn. {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage only.

bonus.name: Shape-Shift
entries: The hag shape-shifts into a Small or Medium Humanoid, or it returns to its true form. Other than its size, its game statistics are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed.

monster.name: Pumpkin Head
languages: understands Common plus one other language

trait.name: Mimicry
entries: The pumpkin head can mimic the voice of the person it replaced or someone it used Personality

trait.name: Consumption on
entries: A creature that hears the voice can tell it's an imitation only with a successful {@dc 14} Wisdom ({@skill Insight|XPHB}) check.

trait.name: Sorrowful Memento
entries: If the pumpkin head can see a creature holding a possession of the person the pumpkin head replaced, it has {@variantrule Disadvantage|XPHB} on {@variantrule D20 Test|XPHB|D20 Tests}.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The pumpkin head makes one Claw attack and one Pitchfork attack, and it can use Personality Consumption if available.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 5}, reach 5 ft. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) Slashing damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) Necrotic damage.

action.name: Pitchfork
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 5}, reach 10 ft. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) Piercing damage, and if the target is a Medium or smaller creature, the pumpkin head can push or pull it 5 feet.

action.name: Personality Consumption {@recharge 5}
entries: The pumpkin head consumes a victim's memories. {@actSave int} {@dc 12}, one creature the pumpkin head can see within 30 feet. {@actSaveFail} The target has the {@condition Stunned|XPHB} condition until the end of its next turn, and its Intelligence score decreases by {@dice 1d4}. The target dies if this reduces that score to 0. A Humanoid slain in this way is replaced by a {@creature Pumpkin Head|CrookedMoon24} {@dice 1d8} hours later unless its body is burned.

trait.name: Compelled Contest
entries: The reveler can't refuse a contest of skill with Musical Instruments. As an {@action Influence|XPHB} action, a creature can make a Charisma ({@skill Performance|XPHB}) check using a Musical Instrument. The reveler must succeed on a Charisma saving throw with a DC equal to the check's total or take 20 Psychic damage and have the {@condition Stunned|XPHB} condition until the end of the creature's next turn.

trait.name: Dancing Step
entries: The reveler doesn't provoke Opportunity Attacks when it leaves an enemy's reach.

trait.name: Ensemble Form
entries: The reveler takes on a specific form: Drone, Drum, or Bell. The form determines certain traits and actions, as well as the instrument the reveler plays (hurdy gurdy, frame drum, or handbells, respectively).

trait.name: Droning Swarm (Drone Only)
entries: A droning swarm of bees surrounds the reveler. {@actSave con} {@dc 16}, each creature that ends its turn in a 10-foot {@variantrule Emanation [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Emanation} originating from the reveler. {@actSaveFail} The target has the {@condition Poisoned|XPHB} condition until the end of its next turn.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The reveler makes two Instrumental Blast attacks.

action.name: Instrumental Blast
entries: {@atkr m,r} {@hit 8}, reach 5 ft. or range 90 ft. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d8 + 5}) Thunder damage.

action.name: Infectious Rhythm (Drum Only)
entries: {@actSave wis} {@dc 16}, up to two creatures the reveler can see within 30 feet. {@actSaveFail} 18 ({@damage 4d8}) Psychic damage, and the target is affected by the Irresistible Dance spell (no {@status Concentration|XPHB} required to maintain the spell). {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage only.

action.name: Stunning Clangor (Bell Only)
entries: {@actSave con} {@dc 16}, one creature the reveler can see within 60 feet. {@actSaveFail} 40 ({@damage 9d8}) Thunder damage, and the target has the {@condition Stunned|XPHB} condition until the end of the reveler's next turn. {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage only.

trait.name: Moral Quandary
entries: As a {@variantrule Bonus Action|XPHB}, a creature can recite the moral of a story using the same theme as the reveler's Storied Form to weaken it for 1 hour. While weakened, the reveler can't take Reactions, and its AC is reduced by 4.

trait.name: Storied Form
entries: The reveler takes on a specific form: Great Beast, Hero, or Witch. The form determines certain traits and the theme of stories the reveler embodies (powerful monsters, brave heroes, or wicked magicians, respectively).

trait.name: Terror Feeding (Witch Only)
entries: If there is at least one creature with the {@condition Frightened|XPHB} condition within 30 feet of the reveler at the end of its turn, the reveler gains 15 {@variantrule Temporary Hit Points|XPHB}.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The reveler makes three Thrash attacks. It can replace one attack with a use of Fabled Assault if available.

action.name: Thrash
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 9}, reach 10 ft. {@h}18 ({@damage 3d8 + 5}) Force damage.

action.name: Fabled Assault {@recharge 5}
entries: The reveler uses the option determined by its Storied Form: Consuming Bite (Great Beast Only). {@actSave con} {@dc 17}, one creature within 5 feet (with {@variantrule Disadvantage|XPHB} if the reveler is grappling the target). {@actSaveFail} 36 ({@damage 8d8}) Necrotic damage. If the target is Huge or smaller, it has the {@condition Grappled|XPHB} condition (escape {@dc 15}), and it has the {@condition Restrained|XPHB} condition until the grapple ends. {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage only. {@actSaveSuccessOrFail} The reveler gains {@variantrule Temporary Hit Points|XPHB} equal to the Necrotic damage taken.

action.name: Heroic Charge (Hero Only)
entries: The reveler moves up to its {@variantrule Speed|XPHB} in a straight line without provoking Opportunity Attacks, and it can move through other creatures without expending extra movement to do so. {@actSave str} {@dc 17}, each creature whose space the reveler enters. {@actSaveFail} 26 ({@damage 4d12}) Force damage, and the target has the {@condition Prone|XPHB} condition. {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage only.

action.name: Wicked Storm (Witch Only)
entries: {@actSave dex} {@dc 17}, each creature in a 60-foot {@variantrule Cone [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Cone}. {@actSaveFail} 27 ({@damage 6d8}) Lightning damage, and the target has the {@condition Frightened|XPHB} condition. While {@condition Frightened|XPHB} in this way, the target's {@variantrule Speed|XPHB} is 0. A {@condition Frightened|XPHB} target repeats the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. After 1 minute, it succeeds automatically. {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage only.

reaction.name: Dramatic Reversal
entries: {@actTrigger} The reveler is hit by an attack roll. {@actResponse} The reveler adds 4 to its AC against that attack, possibly causing it to miss.

trait.name: Fungal Step
entries: The rotweaver ignores {@variantrule Difficult Terrain|XPHB} caused by plants or fungi.

trait.name: Hunting Horn
entries: The rotweaver carries a hunting horn.
The horn has AC 16, HP 10, and {@variantrule Immunity|XPHB} to Necrotic, Poison, and Psychic damage.

trait.name: Iron Binding
entries: If the rotweaver has iron wrapped around a part of its body, such as an iron bracelet, Manacles, or Chain (treat any of them as applying Manacles), the rotweaver can move, take an action, or a {@variantrule Bonus Action|XPHB}, but not all three.

action.name: Staff
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 5}, reach 5 ft. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) Necrotic damage.

action.name: Call the Rot (Requires Hunting Horn; Recharge 5-6)
entries: {@actSave con} {@dc 13}, each creature in a 30- foot {@variantrule Cone [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Cone}. {@actSaveFail} 11 ({@damage 2d10}) Necrotic damage, and the target has the {@condition Poisoned|XPHB} condition until the end of its next turn. {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage only. {@actSaveSuccessOrFail} The horn call is audible out to 300 feet, and any noncreature plants in the {@variantrule Cone [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Cone} die from fungus and rot.

monster.name: Serum Brute
senses: Blindsight 60 ft. (blind beyond this radius unless Unleashed Eyes is active)

trait.name: Curse Dependent
entries: If the brute is targeted by a {@spell Remove Curse|XPHB} spell or similar magic, until it finishes a {@variantrule Long Rest|XPHB}, the brute loses its Blindsight, its Withering Eye trait, and its Cursed Gaze action.

trait.name: Stimulant Rush
entries: At the start of its turn, the brute must choose one of the following options (it can't use that option twice in a row):

trait.name: Catalyst Infusion
entries: Until the start of its next turn, the brute's {@variantrule Speed|XPHB} increases to 50 feet, it doesn't provoke an Opportunity Attack when it leaves an enemy's reach, and its {@variantrule Long Jump|XPHB} is up to 30 feet and its {@variantrule High Jump|XPHB} is up to 15 feet with or without a running start.

trait.name: Caustic Secretion
entries: Until the start of its next turn, its Fist attack deals an extra 11 ({@damage 2d10}) Acid damage (included in the Fist attack below).

trait.name: Stim Boost
entries: Gain 10 {@variantrule Temporary Hit Points|XPHB}.

trait.name: Unleashed Eyes (1/Day)
entries: When the brute is {@variantrule Bloodied|XPHB}, its sealed eyes rip open and unleash its curse. It is no longer blind beyond 60 feet, and it can use its Withering Eye trait and Cursed Gaze action until it finishes a {@variantrule Long Rest|XPHB}, whereupon its eyes seal shut again.

trait.name: Withering Eye (Unleashed Eyes Only)
entries: When the brute moves to within 5 feet of a creature, the creature takes 4 ({@damage 1d8}) Psychic damage. A creature takes this damage only once per turn.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The brute makes two Fist attacks and can use Cursed Gaze if available.

action.name: Fist
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 8}, reach 10 ft. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d8 + 5}) Bludgeoning damage. If Caustic Secretion is active, the target takes an extra 11 ({@damage 2d10}) Acid damage.

action.name: Cursed Gaze (Unleashed Eyes Only)
entries: {@actSave wis} {@dc 16}, each creature in a 30-foot {@variantrule Cone [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Cone}. {@actSaveFail} 9 ({@damage 2d8}) Psychic damage, and the target has the {@condition Frightened|XPHB} condition until the start of the brute's next turn. {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage only.

reaction.name: Devotion
entries: {@actTrigger} An ally within 5 feet takes damage. {@actResponse} The ally gains {@variantrule Resistance|XPHB} to the triggering damage, and the brute takes an amount of Psychic damage equal to the damage the ally takes.

trait.name: Mist Form
entries: The shrouded can enter another creature's space and stop there. It can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch without spending extra movement to do so.

trait.name: Corrupting Mist
entries: {@actSave con} {@dc 13}, a creature that starts its turn in the shrouded's space. {@actSaveFail} 10 ({@damage 3d6}) Necrotic damage. {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage. {@actSaveSuccessOrFail} The soul of a Humanoid that dies from this damage becomes a new shrouded at the start of the shrouded's next turn and takes its turn on that {@variantrule Initiative|XPHB}.
The Humanoid can't be returned to life until the new shrouded is destroyed.

trait.name: Graveyard Warding
entries: The shrouded can't move through a space with a barrier or line of iron, such as a wrought iron fence or a line of iron filings. This impassible barrier rises to a height of 1 mile above the iron.

trait.name: Variation
entries: The shrouded has one of three variants, which determines a unique action option: Devourer, Reaper, or Whisperer.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The shrouded makes two melee attacks.

action.name: Corrupting Touch
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 5}, reach 5 ft. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) Necrotic damage.

action.name: Consuming Bite (Devourer Only)
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 5}, reach 10 ft. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) Bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it has the {@condition Grappled|XPHB} condition (escape {@dc 13}). At the start of a {@condition Grappled|XPHB} target's turn, it takes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) Necrotic damage, and the shrouded regains {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB} equal to that amount.

action.name: Scythe (Reaper Only)
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 5}, reach 5 ft. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) Slashing damage plus 10 ({@damage 3d6}) Necrotic damage. If the target is a creature, it can't regain {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB} until the start of the shrouded's next turn.

action.name: Toxic Thoughts (Whisperer Only)
entries: {@actSave int} {@dc 13}, each creature that isn't a Construct or Undead in a 30-foot {@variantrule Emanation [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Emanation} originating from the shrouded. {@actSaveFail} 7 ({@damage 2d6}) Psychic damage, and the target has the {@condition Frightened|XPHB} condition until the start of the shrouded's next turn. {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage only.

monster.name: Skitterswarm
languages: understands Common and Sylvan but can't speak

trait.name: Body Burrowing
entries: If the swarm can see the corpse of a Humanoid at the start of its turn, it must move up to its {@variantrule Speed|XPHB} toward the corpse. Once it enters the corpse's space, it must remain there for 1 hour, after which time the corpse's flesh putrefies.

trait.name: Swarm
entries: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny centipede. The swarm can't regain {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB} or gain {@variantrule Temporary Hit Points|XPHB}.

trait.name: Vile Vermin
entries: {@actSave con} {@dc 12}, any creature that starts its turn in the swarm's space. {@actSaveFail} The target contracts a magical contagion. While afflicted, the target can't regain {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB}, and it repeats the save when it finishes a {@variantrule Long Rest|XPHB} or when targeted by an effect that ends the {@condition Poisoned|XPHB} condition, recovering from the contagion on a success. {@actSaveSuccess} The target is immune to the Vile Vermin trait of all skitterswarms for 24 hours.

action.name: Infesting Bite
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 4}, reach 5 ft. {@h}7 ({@damage 2d6}) Piercing damage, or 3 ({@damage 1d6}) Piercing damage if the swarm is {@variantrule Bloodied|XPHB}. If the target is a creature, a centipede infests its body. While infested, the target takes 3 ({@damage 1d6}) Necrotic damage at the start of each of its turns. The infestation ends when the target regains {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB} or is targeted by an effect that ends the {@condition Poisoned|XPHB} condition.

trait.name: Corpse Fuel
entries: If the stoker can see a corpse at the start of its turn, it must move as far as possible to enter the corpse's space and use its action to incinerate the corpse. Medium or smaller corpses are reduced to ash, and larger corpses are partially incinerated and decrease one size.

trait.name: Fire Form
entries: The stoker can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch without expending extra movement to do so, and it can enter a creature's space and stop there. The first time it enters a creature's space on a turn, that creature takes 4 ({@damage 1d8}) Fire damage.

trait.name: Illumination
entries: The stoker sheds {@variantrule Dim Light|XPHB} in a 30-foot radius.

trait.name: Soul Burn
entries: At the end of each of the stoker's turns, each creature in a 5-foot {@variantrule Emanation [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Emanation} originating from the stoker takes 4 ({@damage 1d8}) Necrotic damage.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The stoker makes two Sear attacks.

action.name: Sear
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 5}, reach 5 ft. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) Fire damage, and the target has {@variantrule Disadvantage|XPHB} on the next attack roll it makes before the start of the elemental's next turn.

bonus.name: Spectral Steam {@recharge 5}
entries: The stoker unleashes a blast of glowing spectral steam. {@actSave dex} {@dc 13}, each creature in a 30-foot {@variantrule Cone [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Cone}. {@actSaveFail} For 1 minute, the target sheds {@variantrule Dim Light|XPHB} in a 10-foot radius and can't benefit from the {@condition Invisible|XPHB} condition.

trait.name: Compelled Delivery
entries: As an {@action Influence|XPHB} action, a creature can direct the swarm to deliver a letter or parcel (which the creature must provide) to a recipient the creature knows. The swarm has the {@condition Charmed|XPHB} condition until it delivers the item to the specified recipient or until it takes damage. While {@condition Charmed|XPHB} in this way, the swarm must deliver the item to the specified recipient if it knows where the recipient is.

trait.name: Swarm
entries: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny pigeon. The swarm can't regain {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB} or gain {@variantrule Temporary Hit Points|XPHB}.

trait.name: Unerring Delivery
entries: If the swarm is tasked to deliver an item to a creature, the swarm knows the distance and direction to the creature while they are on the same plane.

action.name: Peck
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 4}, reach 5 ft. {@h}5 ({@damage 2d4}) Piercing damage, or 2 ({@damage 1d4}) Piercing damage if the swarm is {@variantrule Bloodied|XPHB}. If the swarm isn't {@variantrule Bloodied|XPHB} and the target is a creature, the target has the {@condition Charmed|XPHB} condition until the start of the swarm's next turn.

reaction.name: Many Eyes, One Voice (1/Day)
entries: {@actTrigger} A creature who tasked the swarm to deliver an item and is on the same plane as the swarm takes an action to see through the swarm. {@actResponse} The swarm becomes a scrying sensor as if the creature cast {@spell Scrying|XPHB}. For the duration, the creature can speak through the swarm.

spellcasting.name: Invisibility
headerEntries: The familiar casts {@spell Invisibility|XPHB} on itself, requiring no spell components and using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability.

trait.name: Disparate Incarnation
entries: The familiar incarnates in a body similar to a pest: Centipede, Pigeon, or Weasel, which determines other traits and actions the familiar has.

trait.name: Fear of Canines
entries: If the familiar can see a dog, wolf, or other canine at the start of its turn, it has the {@condition Frightened|XPHB} condition until the start of its next turn. While {@condition Frightened|XPHB} in this way, it has {@variantrule Disadvantage|XPHB} on saving throws.

trait.name: Flyby (Pigeon Only)
entries: The familiar doesn't provoke an Opportunity Attack when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

trait.name: Spider Climb (Centipede Only)
entries: The familiar can climb difficult surfaces, including along ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

trait.name: Vermin Telepathy
entries: The familiar can magically control Beasts and swarms that match its incarnation (centipedes, pigeons, weasels, giant versions of each, as well as Boogleswarms, Skitterswarms, and Squabswarms ) within 120 feet of itself, using a special telepathy.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The familiar makes two Rend attacks.

action.name: Rend
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 6}, reach 5 ft. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) Piercing damage plus 3 ({@damage 1d6}) Psychic damage.

action.name: Incarnated Assault {@recharge 5}
entries: The familiar uses the option that matches its incarnation.

action.name: Confounding Scratch (Weasel Only)
entries: {@actSave cha} {@dc 12}, one creature the familiar can see within 5 feet. {@actSaveFail} 21 ({@damage 6d6}) Necrotic damage, and the target is affected by the {@spell Confusion|XPHB} spell until the start of the familiar's next turn. {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage only.

action.name: Infectious Sting (Centipede Only)
entries: {@actSave con} {@dc 12}, one creature the familiar can see within 5 feet. {@actSaveFail} 10 ({@damage 3d6}) Poison damage, and the target has the {@condition Poisoned|XPHB} condition until the end of the familiar's next turn. While {@condition Poisoned|XPHB} in this way, the target has the {@condition Paralyzed|XPHB} condition. {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage only.

action.name: Terrifying Flutter (Pigeon Only)
entries: {@actSave wis} {@dc 12}, one creature the familiar can see within 5 feet. {@actSaveFail} 21 ({@damage 6d6}) Psychic damage, and the target has the {@condition Frightened|XPHB} condition until the end of the familiar's next turn. The {@condition Frightened|XPHB} target uses its movement on its turn to get as far away as possible from the familiar, moving by the safest route. {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage only.

trait.name: Infighting
entries: As an {@action Influence|XPHB} action, a creature that insinuates that the components of the swarm are conspiring against each other and succeeds on a {@dc 15} Charisma ({@skill Deception|XPHB}) check deals 10 Necrotic damage to the swarm.

trait.name: Spider Climb
entries: The swarm can climb difficult surfaces, including along ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

trait.name: Swarm
entries: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can fit through any opening large enough for a Tiny creature. The swarm can't regain {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB} or gain {@variantrule Temporary Hit Points|XPHB}.

action.name: Shred
entries: {@atkr m,r} {@hit 6}, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., {@h}14 ({@damage 4d4 + 4}) Piercing damage, or 9 ({@damage 2d4 + 4}) Piercing damage if the swarm is

action.name: Bloodied
entries: If the target is a Medium or smaller creature in the swarm's space, the target has the {@condition Grappled|XPHB} condition (escape {@dc 14}). The swarm can have one creature {@condition Grappled|XPHB} at a time. At the start of each of the {@condition Grappled|XPHB} target's turns, roll {@dice 1d6} to see which of the following effects it suffers:

items.name: 1-2: Centipede Sting
entries: The target takes 4 ({@damage 1d8}) Poison damage and has the {@condition Poisoned|XPHB} condition until the start of its next turn.

items.name: 3-4: Pigeon Cry
entries: The target takes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) Psychic damage.

items.name: 5-6: Weasel Drain
entries: The target takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) Necrotic damage, and its {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB|Hit Point} maximum decreases by an amount equal to the Necrotic damage taken.

trait.name: Bottle Trap
entries: A haint that enters the space of an upright, empty bottle must succeed on a {@dc 16} Charisma saving throw or be drawn into the bottle, and a cork or stopper appears to close the bottle. The trapped haint can see and hear through the bottle out to 10 feet, and any creature in that range can hear the haint. The haint is released if the bottle breaks or another creature opens it.

trait.name: Incorporeal Movement
entries: The haint can move through other creatures and objects as if they were {@variantrule Difficult Terrain|XPHB}. It takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) Force damage if it ends its turn inside a solid object.

action.name: Draining Regret
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 4}, reach 5 ft. {@h}10 ({@damage 3d6}) Psychic damage, and the target gains 1 {@condition Exhaustion|XPHB} level. This can't raise the target's {@condition Exhaustion|XPHB} level above 5, and all {@condition Exhaustion|XPHB} levels gained from this action end when the target finishes a {@variantrule Short Rest|XPHB|Short} or {@variantrule Long Rest|XPHB}, or if it receives a {@spell Lesser Restoration|XPHB} spell or similar magic.

spellcasting.name: Coven Magic
headerEntries: While within 30 feet of at least two hag allies, the hag can cast one of the following spells, requiring no Material components, using the spell's normal casting time, and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability: {@spell Augury|XPHB}, {@spell Find Familiar|XPHB}, {@spell Identify|XPHB}, {@spell Locate Object|XPHB}, {@spell Lucky Charm|CrookedMoon24} (lasts until the hag casts it again, or chooses to end it with no action required), or {@spell Unseen Servant|XPHB}. The hag must finish a {@variantrule Long Rest|XPHB} before using this trait to cast that spell again.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The hag casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 13}):

trait.name: Biting Gift
entries: If a creature willingly offers one of its teeth to the hag, the hag must accept it and has the {@condition Charmed|XPHB} condition for 24 hours, or until the creature or its allies deal damage to the hag or force it to make a saving throw.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The hag has {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB} on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The hag makes one Bite attack and uses Spellcasting (at will spells only).

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 6}, reach 5 ft. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) Piercing damage plus 10 ({@damage 3d6}) Psychic damage.
BestIAry

action.name: Waking Terrors {@recharge 5}
entries: {@actSave wis} {@dc 13}, one creature the hag can see within 30 feet. If the hag has one of the target's teeth, the target has Disadavantage on the save. {@actSaveFail} 21 ({@damage 6d6}) Psychic damage, and the target has the {@condition Frightened|XPHB} condition.

While {@condition Frightened|XPHB} in this way, the target perceives its allies as enemies born from its nightmares, but it isn't compelled to act against or harm them. At the end of each of its turns, the target repeats the save, ending the effect on itself on a success. After 1 minute, it succeeds automatically. {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage only.

bonus.name: Shape-Shift
entries: The hag shape-shifts to resemble a Tiny weasel ({@variantrule Speed|XPHB} 30 ft., Climb 30 ft.) or a Small or Medium Humanoid, or back into her true form. Her game statistics, other than her {@variantrule Speed|XPHB} as a weasel and her size, are the same in each form. Any equipment she is wearing or carrying isn't transformed.

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The wellwyrm can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Hunting Terror
entries: If the wellwyrm hears a creature play a horn or similar Musical Instrument, it has the {@condition Frightened|XPHB} condition until the end of its next turn.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The wellwyrm makes one Bite attack and uses Constrict.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 8}, reach 10 ft. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d10 + 4}) Piercing damage plus 21 ({@damage 6d6}) Poison damage.

action.name: Constrict
entries: {@actSave str} {@dc 16}, one Medium or smaller creature the wellwyrm can see within 5 feet. {@actSaveFail} 13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) Bludgeoning damage. The target has the {@condition Grappled|XPHB} condition (escape {@dc 14}), and it has the {@condition Restrained|XPHB} condition until the grapple ends. The wellwyrm needn't spend extra movement to move during this grapple.

trait.name: Incorporeal Movement
entries: The wildpyre can move through other creatures and objects as if they were {@variantrule Difficult Terrain|XPHB}. It takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) Force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

trait.name: Quenching Water
entries: Any water affects the wildpyre as if it were Holy Water.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The wildpyre makes two Blazing Rend attacks and uses Flame Bind if available.

action.name: Blazing Rend
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 7}, reach 5 ft. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) Necrotic damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) Fire damage, and the target begins burning. If the target is a creature no larger than the wildpyre, it has the {@condition Prone|XPHB} condition.

action.name: Flame Bind {@recharge 5}
entries: {@actSave dex} {@dc 15}, one creature the wildpyre can see within 60 feet. {@actSaveFail} The target has the {@condition Restrained|XPHB} condition. At the end of each of the target's turns, it repeats the saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success. During the target's turn, it can choose to end the {@condition Restrained|XPHB} condition by taking 6 ({@damage 1d12}) Fire damage plus 6 ({@damage 1d12}) Necrotic damage.

trait.name: Aversion to Axes
entries: At the start of the woodwarped's turn, if it can see a creature holding a Battleaxe, a Greataxe, or a Handaxe, it has the {@condition Frightened|XPHB} condition until the start of its next turn.

trait.name: Thorns
entries: At the start of each of its turns, the woodwarped deals 5 ({@damage 2d4}) Piercing damage to any creature it is grappling or any creature grappling it.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The woodwarped makes two Claw attacks.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 6}, reach 5 ft. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) Slashing damage plus 4 ({@damage 1d8}) Poison damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it has the {@condition Grappled|XPHB} condition (escape {@dc 14}) from one of two claws.

action.name: Thorn Spray {@recharge 5}
entries: {@actSave dex} {@dc 13}, each creature in a 15-foot {@variantrule Emanation [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Emanation} originating from the woodwarped, with {@variantrule Disadvantage|XPHB} if {@condition Grappled|XPHB} by it. {@actSaveFail} 14 ({@damage 4d6}) Piercing damage, and the target has the {@condition Poisoned|XPHB} condition. At the end of each of its turns, the target repeats the save, ending the effect on itself on a success. After 1 minute, it succeeds automatically. {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage only.

reaction.name: Splintered Propagation (1/Day)
entries: {@actTrigger} The woodwarped takes Slashing damage that isn't from a Battleaxe, Greataxe, or Handaxe. {@actResponse} A fragment of the woodwarped breaks off and rapidly grows into a new Woodwarped in an unoccupied space within 5 feet of the original. The new woodwarped is Small, has 10 {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB}, only has the Claw action, lacks this {@variantrule Reaction|XPHB}, and takes its turn on the original woodwarped's {@variantrule Initiative|XPHB}.

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: The surgeon regains 10 {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB} at the start of each of its turns. If it takes Poison damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of its next turn. The surgeon dies only if it starts its turn with 0 {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB} and doesn't regenerate.

trait.name: Veiled Ignorance
entries: A creature whose mind can't be read, or that is under the effect of a {@spell Mind Blank|XPHB} or {@spell Nondetection|XPHB} spell, has the {@condition Invisible|XPHB} condition toward the surgeon (this ignores the surgeon's Blindsight).

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The surgeon makes two Bone Saw attacks.

action.name: Bone Saw
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 7}, reach 5 ft. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) Slashing damage plus 4 ({@damage 1d8}) Psychic damage.
Critical {@h}If the target is a creature, its Intelligence score decreases by {@dice 1d4}. The target dies if this reduces that score to 0.

action.name: Infested Spray {@recharge 5}
entries: The surgeon unleashes a spray of worm-ridden cerebral fluid. {@actSave dex} {@dc 14}, each creature in a 20-foot {@variantrule Cone [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Cone}. {@actSaveFail} 17 ({@damage 5d6}) Psychic damage, and the target is infested with larval parasitic worms. The target takes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) Psychic damage at the end of each of its turns as the worms burrow toward its brain. The ongoing damage ends when the target takes Poison damage or is targeted by an effect that ends the {@condition Poisoned|XPHB} condition. {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage only. {@actSaveSuccessOrFail} If the target is reduced to 0 {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB} by this Psychic damage, the worms reach its brain and it dies. A Humanoid slain in this way rises 24 hours later as a wormhost surgeon.

reaction.name: Protective Parasite
entries: {@actTrigger} The surgeon is reduced to 0 {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB}. {@actResponse} The parasite worm emerges from the surgeon's exposed brain and spits acid—{@actSave dex} {@dc 14}, each creature in a 20-foot-long, 5-foot-wide {@variantrule Line [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Line}. {@actSaveFail} 10 ({@damage 3d6}) Acid damage. {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage.

trait.name: Husk Body
entries: The corn dolly can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch without expending extra movement to do so.

trait.name: Uneasy Visage
entries: The strange, childlike inked face unnerves onlookers. While a creature is holding the corn dolly, creatures within 10 feet of it have {@variantrule Disadvantage|XPHB} on Wisdom ({@skill Insight|XPHB}) checks made against the creature.

action.name: Husk Cut
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 5}, reach 5 ft. {@h}1 Slashing damage plus 4 ({@damage 1d8}) Psychic damage.

action.name: Blank Stare
entries: {@actSave wis} {@dc 13}, one creature the corn dolly can see within 30 feet. {@actSaveFail} 10 ({@damage 3d6}) Psychic damage. {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage.

action.name: Sowing Dread (2/Day)
entries: {@actSave wis} {@dc 13}, each creature of the corn dolly's choice in a 15- foot {@variantrule Cone [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Cone}. {@actSaveFail} The target has the {@condition Frightened|XPHB} condition until the end of its next turn.

reaction.name: Silent Protector (Recharge after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: {@actTrigger} A creature within 60 feet fails a saving throw against an effect that doesn't deal damage. {@actResponse} The corn dolly suffers the effects of the failure instead of the creature.

trait.name: Trackless Step
entries: The crooked hare leaves no tracks, or it leaves the tracks of a Large or smaller creature of its choice. If it doesn't have the {@condition Incapacitated|XPHB} condition, it can share the effects of this trait with another creature within 5 feet (no action required).

action.name: Twisting Bite
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 5}, reach 5 ft. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) Piercing damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) Poison damage, and if the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 11} Charisma saving throw or become cursed for 24 hours. The cursed creature's limbs sporadically twist and move in unnatural ways, giving the creature {@variantrule Disadvantage|XPHB} on attack rolls and on ability checks that rely on Charisma.

trait.name: Scent of Death
entries: Creatures that can smell have {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB} on Wisdom ({@skill Perception|XPHB}) checks made to find the devil's glove.

trait.name: Spider Climb
entries: The devil's glove can climb difficult surfaces, including along ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

action.name: Tendril
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 4}, reach 5 ft. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) Bludgeoning damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) Necrotic damage, and the devil's glove attaches to the target. While attached, the devil's glove can't make Tendril attacks against other targets, and if the target is a creature, the target has the {@condition Poisoned|XPHB} condition until the start of its next turn if it can smell the devil's glove.
The devil's glove can detach itself by spending 5 feet of its movement. The target or a creature within 5 feet of it can detach the devil's glove as an action.

action.name: Decaying Bloom (2/Day)
entries: {@actSave con} {@dc 12}, each creature in a 10-foot {@variantrule Emanation [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Emanation} originating from the devil's glove. {@actSaveFail} 9 ({@damage 2d8}) Necrotic damage, and the target can't regain {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB} until the start of the devil's glove's next turn. {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage only.

bonus.name: Symbiosis
entries: The devil's glove forms a magical bond with a willing creature it touches. The bonded creature doesn't need to eat or drink, and the creature has {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB} on saving throws to avoid or end the {@condition Poisoned|XPHB} condition. The bond ends when the creature dies, the devil's glove dies, the devil's glove ends the bond (no action required), or when the devil's glove uses this {@variantrule Bonus Action|XPHB} again.

trait.name: Boil and Bubble
entries: While the dingpot doesn't have the {@condition Incapacitated|XPHB} condition, it can provide enough heat to boil water within its vessel.

action.name: Steam Spray
entries: {@atkr r} {@hit 4}, range 60 ft. {@h}7 ({@damage 2d4 + 2}) Fire damage, and the target has {@variantrule Disadvantage|XPHB} on the next attack roll it makes before the start of the dingpot's next turn. Being underwater doesn't grant {@variantrule Resistance|XPHB} to this Fire damage.

action.name: Brew (1/Day)
entries: The dingpot produces a magical elixir within its vessel. The elixir remains potent for 24 hours. It can choose from the following brews:

action.name: Healing Draught
entries: As a {@variantrule Bonus Action|XPHB}, a creature can drink the elixir to regain 4 ({@dice 1d6 + 1}) {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB}.

action.name: Lucky Draught
entries: As a {@variantrule Bonus Action|XPHB}, a creature can drink the elixir to gain startling luck for 10 minutes. When the creature fails an ability check or a saving throw, it can reroll the {@dice d20} and use the new roll. Once this causes a roll to succeed, the effects of the elixir end early.

trait.name: Ephemeral Body
entries: The crawler can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch without expending extra movement to do so.

trait.name: Seer's Strand
entries: The crawler can see and hear through the space of its Ether Webs as if it were in that space.

trait.name: Spider Climb
entries: The crawler can climb difficult surfaces, including along ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

trait.name: Web Walker
entries: The crawler ignores movement restrictions caused by webs, and the crawler knows the location of any other creature in contact with the same web.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The crawler makes two Bite attacks.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 5}, reach 5 ft. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) Piercing damage, and if the target is a creature, it has the {@condition Poisoned|XPHB} condition until the start of the crawler's next turn.

action.name: Ether Webs (2/Day)
entries: The crawler fills a 5-foot {@variantrule Cube [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Cube} with {@condition Invisible|XPHB}, ephemeral webs for 8 hours. If the web isn't anchored between two solid masses (such as walls or trees) or layered across a floor, wall, or ceiling, the web collapses on itself and vanishes. When a creature touches the webbing, the crawler knows the location of the creature as long as they are on the same plane of existence.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The goatstealer has {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB} on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the goatstealer's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally doesn't have the {@condition Incapacitated|XPHB} condition.

trait.name: Stench
entries: {@actSave con} {@dc 12}, any creature that starts its turn in a 5-foot {@variantrule Emanation [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Emanation} originating from the goatstealer. {@actSaveFail} The target has the {@condition Poisoned|XPHB} condition until the start of its next turn. {@actSaveSuccess} The target is immune to the Stench of all goatstealers for 1 hour.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 4}, reach 5 ft. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) Piercing damage plus 3 ({@damage 1d6}) Poison damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it has the {@condition Grappled|XPHB} condition (escape {@dc 12}). Until the grapple ends, at the start of each of the goatstealer's turns, the target takes 3 ({@damage 1d6}) Poison damage.

trait.name: Blood Sense
entries: The hemonculus knows the location of any {@variantrule Bloodied|XPHB} creature within 60 feet of it, unless the creature is a Construct or Undead.

trait.name: Flyby
entries: The hemonculus doesn't provoke an Opportunity Attack when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The hemonculus has {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB} on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 5}, reach 5 ft. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) Slashing damage plus 3 ({@damage 1d6}) Necrotic damage, and the hemonculus attaches to the target. While attached, the hemonculus automatically hits the target with its Claw attacks.
The hemonculus can detach itself by spending 5 feet of its movement. The target or a creature within 5 feet of it can detach the hemonculus as an action.

action.name: Exsanguinate (1/Day)
entries: The hemonculus magically draws blood from nearby creatures. {@actSave con} {@dc 13}, each creature of the hemonculus' choice in a 15-foot {@variantrule Emanation [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Emanation} originating from the hemonculus. {@actSaveFail} 10 ({@damage 3d6}) Necrotic damage, and the target can't regain {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB} until the start of the hemonculus's next turn. {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage only. {@actSaveSuccessOrFail} If the hemonculus is attached to a creature, the hemonculus regains {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB} equal to the Necrotic damage taken by that target.

trait.name: Flyby
entries: The magpie doesn't provoke an Opportunity Attack when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The magpie makes two Beak attacks.

action.name: Beak
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 5}, reach 5 ft. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) Piercing damage plus 3 ({@damage 1d6}) Radiant damage.

bonus.name: Bonded Voice
entries: The magpie can form or dissolve a magical bond with a willing creature within 5 feet. While the bond lasts, the bonded creature can speak through the magpie using the creature's own voice and language, but with a birdlike lilt. The bond ends when the creature dies or if the magpie creates a new bond.

reaction.name: One for Sorrow (1/Day)
entries: {@actTrigger} A creature within 30 feet of the magpie makes a {@variantrule D20 Test|XPHB} with {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB}. {@actResponse} The target rolls {@dice 1d6} and subtracts it from the total.

reaction.name: Two for Joy (2/Day)
entries: {@actTrigger} The magpie or another creature within 30 feet makes an ability check or a saving throw. {@actResponse} The target rolls {@dice 1d4} and adds it to the total.

trait.name: Detect Life
entries: The moonshine magically senses the direction of creatures up to 60 feet away that aren't Constructs or Undead.

trait.name: Ephemeral
entries: The moonshine can't wear or carry anything.

trait.name: Illumination
entries: The moonshine sheds {@variantrule Bright Light|XPHB} in a 15- foot radius and {@variantrule Dim Light|XPHB} for an additional 15 feet.

trait.name: Incorporeal Movement
entries: The moonshine can move through other creatures and objects as if they were

trait.name: Difficult Terrain
entries: It takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) Force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The moonshine makes two Gloomy Touch attacks.
